column4: there is more to this channel than greeting people randomly and asking if they posted in the forums.  generally it goes like this: someone asks a question. if you know the answer, you answer. if you don't know the answer, you don't answer
because the topic is support, and you're not giving any nor asking for any
you have given exactly ZERO advice in the hours i have watched you
I think you are joking I have been on for 3 hours and welcomed many new visitors and pointed them in the right directions
